Package crimp::ppm 0.2
Meta platform win32-x86_64
Meta build::date 2022-06-10
Meta generated::by {critcl 3.1.18} ashok
Meta generated::date critcl
Meta license Under a BSD license.
Meta author {Andreas Kupries}
Meta summary Extension of the CRIMP core to handle import and export of
Meta summary PPM images
Meta description This package provides the CRIMP eco-system with the
Meta description functionality to handle images stored as Portable
Meta description PixMap (PPM). It can read and write both plain and raw
Meta description formats.
Meta subject image {PPM image} {Portable PixMap} {PPM import}
Meta subject {PPM export} image {image import} {image export}
Meta require crimp {crimp::core 0.2} {Tcl 8.5}
Meta included tcl/policy_ppm_1.tcl critcl-rt.tcl
Meta included win32-x86_64/crimp_ppm.dll
Meta entrytclcommand {eval [list ::apply {dir {
    source [file join $dir critcl-rt.tcl]
    set path [file join $dir [::critcl::runtime::MapPlatform]]
    set ext [info sharedlibextension]
    set lib [file join $path "crimp_ppm$ext"]
    load $lib Crimp_ppm
    ::critcl::runtime::Fetch $dir policy_ppm_1.tcl
    package provide crimp::ppm 0.2
}} $dir]}
